title: Attempt to Join Queue Failed
body:
The warning for the queues being disables is no longer there but any time I try to join a game I get a message that says "Attempt to Join Queue Failed", so far I've tried Blind Pick/Ranked/ARAM

Anyone else? Any idea when it will be fixed?

Cheers

EDIT: Besides it asks me to go to Player Support but there is no information anywhere regarding this issue. I searched the FAQ and nothing anywhere.
Fran

replies.body:
Was told by player support that my account is probably trapped in a ghost game (I got stuck right after champ select when the game failed to start).
It should be free in around 4 hours.. restarting the PC might help.

Good luck guys.
Any luck? Ghost games will often occur in tandem with issues like this, so it sucks but it's not wholly surprising if that's what you're experiencing. Hope everything's all good now!
Me and my team got stuck in champ select for 10 minutes after we got a message in lobby saying SR will take few minute to load
yea i sent bugg report they dnt care were just oce
